channel.title: Dead
channel.description:
Well now that runescape is officially dead I need something to do.
suggestions please?

item.title: Dead
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

PvPXile:

I played RuneScape back in 2006 as a kid, and I enjoyed every minute, it was kind of like a part of my childhood. Everything changes and I accept that, up to about 2008 all of the updates were understandable, 2009, not so. And ever since Gower handed over development it all went down hill. It’s all about micro transactions and money. The thing that made RuneScape the game we all knew and loved was the all round feel of it. After the Evolution of Combat, players look like they have a fork up there ass. All runnig around with loveing ridiculous stances, equipping two weapons. What the love was going through their head when they turned the good old special attack bar, which always spiced up a fight into a bunch of retarded abilities and makes RuneScape just as shit as all the others. You all think the old combat system was repetative. If you had some skill and understanding you wouldnt feel that way. Wearing full rune and poking someone with an overpowered dungeoneering weapon isn’t PK. PK is switching armour, switching attack styles, tactical eating, weapon combos and switches. In my opinion hybridding was the only way to show off true skill in runescape, now we have a bunch of 12 year olds with their torva they bought from Gold4RS with 564765856856 HP and spamming their keyboards and hitting action buttons. Bring back an old server. Dont give us the we cant bullshit. We have private servers with csutomisable gameframes, so JaGex, love you for loveing taking away part of our childhood. Also I must add I’m doing work experience at Jagex Game Studios becuase I live in Cambridge, believe me I will sepak my mind.

Me too. I played RS when I was 4. Hint hint: That’s why my username is Arham ‘4’!! And my birthday’s in October 31st, so, I was 4 in 2005 as I started in May.

Read full topic

Google Trends

Suchinteresse nach Zeitraum, Ort und Beliebtheit bei Google Trends erkunden


[/quote]I assume that’s how many people have searched the term “runescape”? Who really searches RuneScape on Google in order to enter their website and play the game? That graph says nothing about their financial state in that case.
[/quote]and I never made that point initially. Either shows the depreciation of google searches or just Runescape searches.

@Spades that’s interesting. You’d think WoW would get searched more.[/quote]
Maybe people finally learned how to use bookmarks rather than google ^.^

item.title: Dead
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:25, topic:469333”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=586485.msg4164326#msg4164326 date=1353518935]

I don’t under why they had to do eoc :/. I liked runescape before it, but now it’s very boring

Are you high? Sitting there for four minutes at a time hitting a single monster, eating food, sometimes using a special attack is entertaining? Yes, quit runescape, you don’t need it to be entertained if that’s the case. Go entertain yourself with some dog toys.
[/quote]You do the exact same thing in eoc but button mash at the same time?[/quote]

I like how in the old combat, when you went pking you would get 1 hit. That was TONS of fun! Made the game so much enjoyable!

Read full topic

item.title: Dead
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I did a steel dragon and a vyre task today and I must say I was impressed by the improvement in it since the begin of beta when I had first tried it out. Dual wielding chaotic rapiers is bad ass against them… use frenzy you hit 10k damage almost every time.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

I played RuneScape back in 2006 as a kid, and I enjoyed every minute, it was kind of like a part of my childhood. Everything changes and I accept that, up to about 2008 all of the updates were understandable, 2009, not so. And ever since Gower handed over development it all went down hill. It’s all about micro transactions and money. The thing that made RuneScape the game we all knew and loved was the all round feel of it. After the Evolution of Combat, players look like they have a fork up there ass. All runnig around with fucking ridiculous stances, equipping two weapons. What the fuck was going through their head when they turned the good old special attack bar, which always spiced up a fight into a bunch of retarded abilities and makes RuneScape just as shit as all the others. You all think the old combat system was repetative. If you had some skill and understanding you wouldnt feel that way. Wearing full rune and poking someone with an overpowered dungeoneering weapon isn’t PK. PK is switching armour, switching attack styles, tactical eating, weapon combos and switches. In my opinion hybridding was the only way to show off true skill in runescape, now we have a bunch of 12 year olds with their torva they bought from Gold4RS with 564765856856 HP and spamming their keyboards and hitting action buttons. Bring back an old server. Dont give us the we cant bullshit. We have private servers with csutomisable gameframes, so JaGex, fuck you for fucking taking away part of our childhood. Also I must add I’m doing work experience at Jagex Game Studios becuase I live in Cambridge, believe me I will sepak my mind.

item.title: Dead
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:20, topic:469333”][quote author=Spades link=topic=586485.msg4163973#msg4163973 date=1353456581]
It isn’t dead. You are just someone who doesn’t like change. I have been playing the Beta. I actually like this update and I have been enjoying it very much! 80k Bots are gone today! I am happy!
[/quote]I don’t mind change, what I do mind is having to spam buttons all day long, and don’t even give me the “you have momentum” bullshit. Momentum is useless because my auto attacks are utter shit due to the whole “weakness” thing…[/quote]

I’ve been doing Slayer with the new combat. I absolutely love it. I played the Beta, so I got a feel for the PVP aspect aswell. Momentum helps a shit ton. You need to just take the time to figure out what works. It is like starting a new game.

Read full topic
